experience: Implemented a three-step financial wizard feature using Vue and VueX, streamlining the acquisition and management of company’s financial data. Led development and integrated data validation for accuracy and reliability.
Enhanced login flow with specialized functionality for Board of Directors members. Implemented automatic redirection to invite page for pending invitations.
Developed an application to seamlessly display user information from their Metamask wallet enhancing accessibility and convenience for users.
Engineered a streamlined one-click login flow, leveraging NextJS, Metamask API, Supabase, and ethers.js, to facilitate a secure and efficient authentication process.
Implemented advanced cryptographic techniques, including nonce and JWT, to generate digital signatures, ensuring the integrity and authenticity of user transactions.

Worked on the complete UI overhaul for the Community Website by using React and Docusaurus to elevate the overall user experience. Also optimized performance and accessibility, resulting in a near-perfect score of nearly 100 on Google’s Lighthouse evaluation.
Optimized and Refactored the Roadmaps page and Footer to adapt to a modern design using ReactJS
